page.title: 17TRADE IN RAYDON
page.content: In Raydon the post office combines with a general store to be the only conventional shop.At Valley Farm grape vine plants are sold while at Goodlands Farm bed and breakfast accommodation may be obtained.Electric Saw and Timber Services are to be found at the Police house now a private dwelling.An annual plant sale takes place at Church Farm in aid of church restoration funds.Other residents sell surplus garden produce and plants throughout the summer and horse manure is always obtainable at Pipers Went Farm.
